scripts.clean:all: find * -maxdepth 0 ! -name package.json -not -name app_scripts -not -name saves -not -name node_modules -not -name package-lock.json -print0 | xargs -0 rm -rf --
scripts.clean:src: npm run clean:js && npm run clean:js.map && npm run clean:json
scripts.make:new: npm run clean:all && npm run copy:new
scripts.make: npm run clean:all && npm run copy:new && npm run clean:app
scripts.prod: npm run build:css && npm run build
scripts.compile: npm run prod && npm run clean:src
